name: Crystal Bay Beach
address: Unnamed Road, Sakti, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: The beach is bustling with numerous people enjoying the sun and sea. If you're feeling hungry or thirsty, fret not as there are warungs and benches available for rent. It's advisable to opt for a bench, especially if you arrive around 11 am. Snorkeling is a popular activity among visitors here. I personally arrived at the beach on a motorbike and paid a parking fee of 5k. The best part is, there is no entrance fee at all, making it a budget-friendly destination for all beach lovers.
review 2: Another gem of a beach tucked away in a remote corner of the island. What makes this place special is, there is hardly any crowd and this provides an environment where you can appreciate the beuty of nature in your solitude without being disturbed by noise of the crowd. It is like having your own private beach. A temple attached to the beach adds charm to the whole place and you will not notice how the time has lapsed.
review 3:
Massive swells on this beach, makes for some fun & excitement in the water.

Cute dogs hiding under my beach chair to keep cool from the heat. üêï
review 4: Not as good as long ago when I first came here. The way to get here is kinda scary, but looks nice. So many people on the beach. If you wanna eat or drink don't worry there are some warung and also some benches that you can rent. Better on the bench if you come around 11am. Some people like to snorkel here. I went here by motorbike and paid 5k for parking. No need to pay entrance at all.
review 5:
Crystal Bay Beach, nestled on the northwest coast of Nusa Penida, is a hidden gem waiting to be discovered by intrepid travelers seeking a slice of paradise. Renowned for its crystalline waters, powdery white sand, and vibrant marine life, this idyllic retreat offers a sanctuary of serenity away from the hustle and bustle of modern life.

As you step onto the shores of Crystal Bay, you're immediately greeted by a sense of tranquility that washes over you like a gentle ocean breeze. The soft, golden sands invite you to kick off your shoes and feel the warmth beneath your toes as you embark on a journey of relaxation and rejuvenation.

One of the defining features of Crystal Bay is its mesmerizing underwater world, making it a haven for snorkelers and divers alike. Submerge yourself in the crystal-clear depths, and you'll be greeted by a kaleidoscope of colors as vibrant coral reefs teem with life. Glide alongside graceful sea turtles, marvel at schools of tropical fish darting to and fro, and lose yourself in the timeless beauty of the ocean's embrace.

For those seeking adventure on land, Crystal Bay offers a plethora of activities to suit every taste. From leisurely strolls along the shoreline to exhilarating water sports such as jet skiing and parasailing, there's no shortage of excitement to be found. As the sun sets in a blaze of fiery hues, casting its golden glow upon the horizon, gather around a beach bonfire with fellow travelers and share stories of the day's adventures beneath a blanket of stars.

While Crystal Bay may not boast the lavish amenities of a luxury resort, its rustic charm and unspoiled beauty are its greatest assets. Accommodations range from simple beachfront bungalows to eco-friendly guesthouses, each offering a unique glimpse into the island's laid-back way of life. Local eateries serve up freshly caught seafood and traditional Indonesian cuisine, tantalizing the taste buds with flavors that are as bold and vibrant as the landscape itself.

In essence, Crystal Bay Beach is a sanctuary for the soul‚Äîa place where time slows down, and the worries of the world melt away with the tide. Whether you're seeking adventure, relaxation, or simply a moment of quiet reflection, this pristine paradise beckons you to discover the magic that lies within its shores.

name: Warung Crystalova
address: Sakti, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: Basic warung. Nice calamari tempura. Lots of flies. No wifi. The warung next to it was playing very loud and annoying metal music.
review 2:
One of the best places to eat local food.
We had dinner after the most amazing sunset ever. The dinner was top. We ordered local grilled fish.
One of the greatest experiences of my life, highly recommended.
review 3: Great spot for dinner if you‚Äôve been down watching the sunset at Crystal Bay! Loved our fried fish, really delicious.
review 4: Great location and great food! That being said, the food took a while to come out, maybe 20-25 minutes, but it was well worth the wait. For two orange juices, calamari tempura and grilled fish, our bill came to 180K.
review 5: We had a lovely lunch and afternoon drinks at Warung Crystalova, the grilled chicken and fruit bowl were delicious. Nice staff. A quiet place with an amazing view!

name: mata air crystal bay
address: 7FM5+7VJ, Sakti, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: Very nice waves but a lot of trash
review 2:
This guy is almost killed us while ‚Äúsnorkeling‚Äù. He bring us to the mantas bay, and there was a huge waves. However, there was a 3 more boats and he told us that it‚Äôs ok, we should go faster to see the mantas. He said ‚Äúgo to the rocks, there is a mantas!‚Äù Whaat??? üôÑ we was trying to swim close to boat for a 3-5 min but suddenly, the waves get worse and all the boats leaving out faster (the other captains get tourists with the rope, but our guy doesn‚Äôt have anything on the board). We was trying to get back on board about 15 min, but it was so hard, coz of waves.
Guy keep yelling at us ‚Äúfaster faster‚Äù, but of course it‚Äôs impossible))
Me and boyfriend is good at swim, that‚Äôs why after 15 min, somehow we get back. I was shaking and full of stress. Waves still is huge. only our boat was there. No mantas, of course, but it doesn‚Äôt matter)
This guy told us that he gonna return the money back and say sorry for that.
On the beach he said ‚Äúgo away‚Äù, when we asked the money back and his colleges tried to kick away us from the beach...
we wasn‚Äôt on the mood to fighting and trying to get our money, so, we just leaved.
But this experience destroyed all our day and journey...
üëâüèªüëâüèªüëâüèªmake sure that you have an everything on boat when you start your trip!!!
review 3: Beautiful beach, good snorkeling,  strong currents are dangerous in some spots (ask the locals), beautiful sunsets
review 4: Freshwater River near the sea ! Love it !
review 5: Nothing extraordinary‚Ä¶ You could skip it.

name: Puri Yalus Bungalow
address: Sakti, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
Rooms are ok. One star for no sleep at all. Constant dog that barks right outside rooms and roosters screaming at 3am . So forget about your sleep.
To make matters worse electricity cuts were common during our stay so no AC :)
review 2: Basic but so old Bali. Comfortable, non pretentious. Let it seep under your skin. Owned by local family who are chill plus but always friendly, polite and helpful. Xxx thank  you :)
review 3: Bungalows and garden are really nice, and it's just a short walk to Crystal bay. You can rent scooter for 100 to visit other places. Staff speaks good English and can arrange other things like a boat or driver. Only reason for downrate: the bungalows have paper thin walls so you'll be woken up by roosters before 6am without ear plugs.
review 4:
Friendly staff, clean bungalows, comfy bed.
Annoying: Payment just in Cash!! ATM at the harbour‚Ä¶ And very small breakfast dish, and for an extra dish, you immediately have to pay extra. Just go here if you have a scooter.
review 5:
If i could give it 0 stars I would
The place looks great in the pictures and ‚Äúbohemian‚Äù but the reality is horrible
There is a fine line between bohemian and dirty and unclean rooms
The toilet looks absolutely disgusting and unhygienic and the bed is filled with spider webs and dirt.
We had 2 more days already paid and we left the place even though we can‚Äôt get our money back but we couldn‚Äôt stay any longer and had to book another place

name: Maharga Bungalows
address: 7FM7+38F, Sakti, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali, Indonesia
review 1:
Everything was perfect until it start raining‚Ä¶ Raining inside the room!!!ü•≤üòÇ
We literally had to go survival mode in the middle of the night putting everything in the center of the room because water was dripping everywhere from the ceiling‚Ä¶
100% recommend if the meteo is sunny üëçüèº
review 2: Simple and clean accommodation which is within walking distance to Crystal Bay. Perfect for our a 2D1N stay as on the 2nd day we explored the east of Nusa Penida and was done with the itinerary by 3pm so we had time to go to Crystal beach to chill and watch sunset. It is not close to the main stretch of bars and restaurants so you will need to take a taxi out for any nightlife. The hotel manager Komang is very responsive and helped us arrange for taxis and accommodated requests for early breakfast and kindly gave us a sample of the coffee powder he uses for the kopi bali which we love!
review 3:
amazing bungalow.
bathroom and bedroom very good.
beautiful garden view. and near to the beach only 5minute .
jungle n nature...
review 4: Nice place to stay. Located very close to Crystal Bay.

name: Bat Cave
address: 7FP4+QRW, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia

name: Crystal Bay Dive Site
address: 7FP4+5J4, Sakti, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali, Indonesia
review 1:
January 2024
We came to crystal bay as part of a 3 stop snorkelling tour in the hope to see manta rays.
Regretfully no manta rays for us today as manta rays too have an ‚Äòoff season‚Äô. At this time of the year you are lucky to see them once or twice a week.
Crystal bay was quite busy with boats - also hoping for manta.
Snorkelling spots with the exception of mangrove point all had a strong current. Our 11 year old, who can swim quite confidently, struggled and needed to sit on the boat for the majority of the 2-3 hour tour. If you are taking your kids and you have your own goggles/snorkle from home - use them as it‚Äôs one less thing your child will have to adjust to. The fins and mask didn‚Äôt fit him properly and he didn‚Äôt enjoy it as much as we wanted.
review 2:
We snorkeled here from a boat on a Tuesday afternoon in April.  There were other boats there, but it was not crowded this time of day.
Water was very clear, beautiful fish abundant, coral was nice.  I followed a sea turtle around for a while.
Water temp was intermittently warm & cold.  Avoid getting too close to the cliffs & surf.
Overall excellent experience!
review 3:
Was here on 30/07-01/08 2022 to see the molas!
30/07 1st dive water temperature 23-24C no mola
31/07 2nd dive water temperature 24C about 1.5-1.8meter mola! I was very lucky because everyone was waiting in the deep area and I was just enjoying the shallow water on the wall, thinking that if it shows up I'll just swim there but then it showed up right in front of me!
As for the dive site, it wasn't as pretty as the other sites, there were a lot of broken corals as I suspect there's a lot of beginners learning how to dive here, every dive I would see at least 1 foreigner falling on and breaking the corals which is a bit sad.
01/08 2nd dive water temperature 24C no mola
review 4: We had better visibility here than at Manta Point, didn't see mola-mola, but plenty of other colourful fishies :-)
review 5: Good visibility, currency not really strong, 45 minutes dive and lots of different fishes. Went there with the guys from Nusa Penida Dive Center, also highly recommend these guys.

name: Warung Nanda
address: 7FM5+HM9, Sakti, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: Delicious food and very good prices with such an amazing view of the beach, we came back to the places 3 times
review 2:
We had lovely food at Warung Nanda on Crystal Bay Beach. The service was quick and friendly and the prices were really reasonable.
We had a few beers and 2x nasi goreng (with satays) and it came to 200k. It was really yummy - especially the chicken satay which were super peanuty!
Nice, large umbrellas and comfortable seats/
Highly recommend!
review 3: We stopped here during for a drink after swimming. We ordered two delicious fresh juices only 30k each. It was so good that we came back for supper. I had the seafood fried rice and my gf had the fried rice special. Both dishes were amazing! Would definitely recommend:)
review 4: This place is run by what appears to be family and it looks like mama is cooking my meal. It tastes like it too. The prices were great and the food even better. After I got my nasi goreng with chicken satay I sat to relax and take the beach in then returned with my group and bought 2 more. Fantastic!
review 5:
Grill fish... SUPERB!!! üòéüëçüí™  Soooo difficult to find a place where they know how to grill!!

But mango juice had too much water... üòì

name: The Santi warung
address: Jalan Crystal Bay, Sakti, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: For a warung on the beach, the quality was very good. We took several meals and all were tasty, the service was great as well. Would recommend if you spend some time at Crystal Bay!
review 2: Amazing place. Dinner whit tuna during the sunset! If you are in nusa penida you have to come!!
review 3: Delicious food and very nice staff, I recommend this restaurant

name: Gita Warung Grilled Fish
address: 7FM6+3Q6, Sakti, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: Friendly, attentive service and very decent food in this humble setting!
review 2: Went there and ordered a pancake (average in flavour) after finishing my meal I thought I‚Äôd stay by the table for another 20 mins until my driver was supposed to pick me up. Staff member came up and said ‚Äúyou finish you go‚Äù and kicked me out!! So rude cannot recommend it
review 3: The place comfortable and the staff very friendly....üòÄüòÄüòÄüòÅüòãüòãüòã
review 4: So rude staff... unfortunately I couldn‚Äôt recommend it

name: Warung Juna
address: 7FM5+JPM, Sakti, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: Amazing grilled fish and Sambal Mateh! Been visiting this place for years and it is consistently great.
review 2: I love their grilled fish with sambal matah freshly made so much so, that I had it every single dinner for a week.
review 3: Randomly ordered here and had the best nasi goreng

name: Sand‚Äôr Dam
address: 7FM5+FM8, Sakti, Nusa Penida, Klungkung Regency, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1:
Awesome to see this man made structure. The water has curved a bend throw the sand which creates a kind of horseshoe bend.
Amazing!
review 2: Our hostel provided a local guide to show us around the island and bring us to all the beautiful places. At the end of the day, he brought us to Crystal bay to see the sunset but this was not all. A most lovely surprise was the Sand‚Äôr Dam! We did not expect it to be this cool to see the brutal power of nature and how strong the dam was built. Definitely a good place to end the day with a nice cold bintang!
review 3: This spot is amazing! Went here a few days ago with some friend and it was amazing to see nature at it‚Äôs purest.

review 2: Their *Adios M F* was amazing, especially at the given cost (.. don't miss it if you visit this place.. and service was also very good..

address: 7FM5+QP3 Crystal Bay Beach, Sakti, Kec. Nusa Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali 80771, Indonesia
review 1: Coconut was not fresh. Answer for my request was ‚Äúpay now‚Äù. Choose another place
review 2: Last night we had an incredibly delicious meal here. The lady who served us was nice! The kitchen does not look very attractive at first glance. However, the food is phenomenally good and very tasty. The prices are decent, I recommend everyone to go here.

name: Warung kame crystal bay

review 1: We had some grilled fish and corn with some fresh watermelon juice. The food was very tasty and the service great! 75k for a grilled fish is also quite a good deal ;)

name: Angga warung
address: 7FM5+GM4, Jalan Raya Crystal Bay, Sakti, Banjar Penida, Kabupaten Klungkung, Bali, Indonesia
review 1: Awesome, comfortable place to relax, eat delicious food - both Western and local dishes, cheap, cold drinks and beer. Warm hospitality and amazing view. Will come back 10/10 üíö
